pr_title: Changes TextMapPropagator.fields() return type from List to Collection

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
               * @return collection of fields that will be used by this formatter.
          
          
            
               * @return the fields that will be used by this formatter.
timeline.author: anuraaga
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -87,12 +88,12 @@ static TextMapPropagator noop() {
    * clear fields as they couldn't have been set before. If it is a mutable, retryable object,
    * successive calls should clear these fields first.
    *
-   * @return list of fields that will be used by this formatter.
+   * @return collection of fields that will be used by this formatter.

timeline.bodyText: It seems the W3CTraceContextPropagator's implementation should also be changed.
timeline.author: Oberon00

replies.bodyText:
Additionally, when doing a CMD + SHFT + F in IntelliJ for fields().. It also highlights the following fields() methods in the propagators.

Do you think we should also change these implementations? As although they are List which is a subtype of Collection, it may be best to be explicit with the types for clarity and consistency.
replies.author: ChrisJBurns

replies.bodyText: Yes, let's change them all for consistency. good catch.
replies.author: jkwatson

replies.bodyText: Pushed changes for all implementations also
replies.author: ChrisJBurns

timeline.message:
Changes return type from List to Collection

- changes the return type of the fields() method in TextMapPropagator from List<String> to Collection<String>
and updated all implementations for consistency

Changes return type from List to Collection

- changes the return type of the fields() method in TextMapPropagator from List<String> to Collection<String>
and updated all implementations for consistency
